rainfalls:
Heavy Rainfall Warning No. 9-A #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Southwest Monsoon (Habagat) and Tropical Storm CRISING

Issued at: 6:19 PM, 18 July 2025(Friday)



ORANGE WARNING LEVEL: Zambales.

ASSOCIATED HAZARD: FLOODING is THREATENING.



YELLOW WARNING LEVEL: Bataan, Bulacan, Rizal, Metro Manila, Cavite, Batangas, Pampanga and Tarlac.

ASSOCIATED HAZARD: FLOODING in flood-prone areas.





Meanwhile, light to moderate with occasional heavy rains affecting Nueva Ecija, Quezon and Laguna which may persist within 3 hours.

The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 8:00 PM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms: As of today, there is no Thunderstorm Advisory Issued.
